title: XSS Vulnerability on all pages

profile.name: Mobile Vikings
profile.about: Mobile Vikings is a prepaid provider that lets you connect to your Viking friends for free!

vulnerability_information:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Load this URL: 

```https://vikingco.com/en/home/tttttt</script><script>alert(0)</script>```

Notice the alert(0) box. 

This is caused by allowing for the user to inject ```</script><script>alert(0)</script>``` which will simply close the current script tag (```</script>```) and then create a new one with alert(0) in it (```<script>alert(0)</script>```). 

If you need any more information, please let me know. 

Thanks,
David Dworken
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1

iQEcBAEBAgAGBQJVTL+KAAoJEKvOin0CBBnPpikH/iVG2N1F+IssOJJjL/m8r65E

vulnerability_information_html:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Load this URL: 


Notice the alert(0) box. 

This is caused by allowing for the user to inject ```</script><script>alert(0)</script>``` which will simply close the current script tag (```</script>```) and then create a new one with alert(0) in it (```<script>alert(0)</script>```). 

If you need any more information, please let me know. 

Thanks,
David Dworken
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1

iQEcBAEBAgAGBQJVTL+KAAoJEKvOin0CBBnPpikH/iVG2N1F+IssOJJjL/m8r65E

activities.message:
Hi David,

Thanks for your report. For some reason, I can see the link in your initial report, can you please re-send it to me?

Thanks a lot! I'm very curious what you've found!
activities.markdown_message:
Hi David,

Thanks for your report. For some reason, I can see the link in your initial report, can you please re-send it to me?

Thanks a lot! I'm very curious what you've found!

activities.message: If you click on raw you can see the link. It looks like the markdown encoder is glitching out.
activities.markdown_message: If you click on raw you can see the link. It looks like the markdown encoder is glitching out.

activities.message:
Hi @ddworken,

Cool - awesome catch, thanks a lot. Confirmed this one and notifying our developers as we speak. I'll update this report as soon as I hear from them.

PS: Have a nice weekend!

Cheers

Inti

activities.message:
Hey @ddworken,

I'm glad to mark this one as resolved.
You can now enjoy the eternal glory of being listed in our Viking Hall of Fame. Hoorray!

Thanks again for this submission, please continue to send us excellent vulnerability reports like this one!

Even though we don't do bounties just yet, I do think it's appropriate to thank you with a little present / some swag as a token of our appreciation. If you drop me an e-mail with your address at inti.de.ceukelaire@mobilevikings.com, I'll have something sent to you. 

Enjoy your weekend!

inti
activities.markdown_message:
Hey @ddworken,

I'm glad to mark this one as resolved.
You can now enjoy the eternal glory of being listed in our Viking Hall of Fame. Hoorray!

Thanks again for this submission, please continue to send us excellent vulnerability reports like this one!

Even though we don't do bounties just yet, I do think it's appropriate to thank you with a little present / some swag as a token of our appreciation. If you drop me an e-mail with your address at inti.de.ceukelaire@mobilevikings.com, I'll have something sent to you.

Enjoy your weekend!

inti
